required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of KN026 in Combination With Palbociclib With or Without Fulvestrant in Patients With Advanced HER2-positive Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ib/II, Open-Label, Multi-Center Study to Evaluate Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of KN026 in Combination With Palbociclib With or Without Fulvestrant in Patients With Locally Advanced Unresectable or Metastatic HER2-positive Breast Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, multicenter, dose-escalation and parallel-group expansion Phase Ib/II clinical trial to evaluate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of KN026 in combination with palbociclib with or without fulvestrant in women or male with HER2-positive metastatic breast cancer .The subjects will receive 20 mg/kg IV Q2W+ palbociclib 100/125 mg/day orally+/-Fulvestrant 500 mg IM until progressive disease, unacceptable toxicity or death.

detailed_description.textblock: KN026 is an anti-HER2 bispecific antibody that can simultaneously bind two non-overlapping epitopes of HER2, leading to a dual HER2 signal blockade.

primary_outcome.description: The proportion of patients experiencing dose limiting toxicities

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: ORR as assessed by the investigator according to RECIST 1.1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: clinical response time (DOR) as determined by investigators based on RECIST 1.1 criteria

secondary_outcome.time_frame: CBR calculated as the proportion of subjects with best overall response of CR, PR, or SD ≥24 weeks

arm_group.description: KN026 20 mg/kg + palbociclib 100 /125 mg/day (Patients with HR-/HER2-positive MBC) or KN026 20 mg/kg + palbociclib 100 /125 mg/day+Fulvestrant 500 mg (Patients with HR+/HER2-positive MBC )
KN026 20 mg/kg + palbociclib RP2D(Patients with HR-/HER2-positive MBC ) or KN026 20 mg/kg + palbociclib RP2D+Fulvestrant 500 mg(Patients with HR+/HER2-positive MBC )

intervention.description: HR-/HER2-positive MBC will be treated by KN026 20 mg/kg and Palbociclib RP2D

intervention.intervention_name: KN026 combined with Palbociclib and Fulvestrant
intervention.description: HR+/HER2-positive MBC will be treated by KN026 20 mg/kg and Palbociclib RP2D+fulvestrant 500 mg

biospec_descr.textblock: ctDNA and single cell sequencing analysis may be performed using plasma samples collected from subjects at baseline and upon disease progression.

study_pop.textblock: diagnosing locally advanced unresectable or metastatic HER2-positive
